snippet: Nidal Malik Hasan, the defendant in a 2009 mass shooting, is representing himself, having dismissed his lawyers, yet he has sought their legal advice, causing conflict.
abstract: Claim by Maj Nidal Malik Hasan that he carried out shooting rampage at Fort Hood in 2009 to protect Taliban leaders has outraged soldiers and military law experts, but it also creates problems for his legal defense team.
lead_paragraph: Nidal Malik Hasan, the defendant in a 2009 mass shooting, is representing himself, having dismissed his lawyers, yet he has sought their legal advice, causing conflict.

headline.seo: Nidal Malik Hasan Wants More Help From His Lawyers
headline.main: Lawyers Torn Over Suspect in Rampage at Fort Hood
headline.print_headline: Lawyers Torn Over Suspect In Rampage At Fort Hood

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
